content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv on april 29, 2015, approximately 9:10pm. all the lights were out in my house. the tv sits  between me and a large double sliding glass door that faces west and overlooks the ocean. i always keep the vertical blinds fully open at night as it is fairly dark behind the house. my house sits on a hill a few blocks east of pacific coast highway ( pch ). because of the houses that sit below me on the hill, i am unable to see directly onto pch. i was suddenly distracted by intensely bright red and white lights moving slowly from a south to north direction. i jumped up, opened the sliding glass doors for a clearer look and could see a craft moving slowly, apparently over pch. it was very low ( a few hundred feet) and because i was up on the hill, i was almost as high up as the craft itself, and in fact it appeared to be less than 100 feet higher than i was. i was only able to see a side profile and was unable to determine its overall shape, but it  seemed to be about 125-150 feet long. the craft was a dull black in color with a lighter black upper section that displayed some definition of squares and rectangles, as if it was a separate section from the rest of the craft. i  noticed a line of about 6 blue-green lights on the front end that appeared to curve slightly,making it appear like that part of the craft was rounded and that the lights may have been widows. there were no lights on the main body but at the rear was a line of intensely bright white lights that almost seemed attached to a metal railing protruding from the rear of the craft. however, the railing may have been an illusion caused by the intensity and flashing. next to these lights, and situated between the white lights and the craft, was a red flashing light, also very very bright. i am familiar with conventional aircraft lights and have seen many planes and helicopters up close on tarmacs and ramps and in the air, but have never seen lights as bright and intense as these. it's fairly quiet by my house so i was able to distinguish an audibly low hum coming from the craft, almost like a muted vacuum cleaner. it moved slowly north until out of view. i stood there in complete amazement trying to figure out what it was that i just saw. i knew immediately it was not a plane. no plane would fly that low over such a densely populated area, and besides, at that slow speed it would have stalled and fallen to the ground, unable to fly. the hum i heard was not that of an airplane prop or jet engine. it was definitely not a helicopter as we constantly have them flying around here ( at times directly overhead ) patrolling the beaches or on military maneuvers, with their very distinct loud whirling sound. a small experimental aircraft? certainly not. too big. and any pilot would have to be crazy to fly at that altitude around here. the faa has a major presence in this area, as we are about 10 miles south of lax and in close proximately to 3 municipal airports. i can't stop thinking about it and am curious if anyone else has reported the same sighting at about the same time.
content.summary: I saw a low-flying, strange-looking craft from my home on april 29, 2015.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Back in about september 2004, i was living in the tri-cities area, wa. i had an incredible upclose ufo encounter that i would like to share.

i thought it was late at night, when it happened, but apparently, upon finding out later, it wasn't as late as i thought. the encounter has left me with some memory/time loss issues. i have thought about hypnosis, but i'm worried that i might not like what i find. however, i have not had any nightmares, so that's why i still toy with the thought of hypnosis. it seems that people who have unpleasant experiences are plagued with nightmares, which i'm not. so, maybe my encounter was one of inspiration, not terror.

the place i lived there, was in a suburb of, pasco, wa, called, burbank, and it was very dark at night, as it's in a more rural area. you can see stars out clearly on a clear night. usually, it's very quiet, too, except for the freeways, north and south, bound, close to where i lived.

i went outside to smoke a cigarette, which i did back in 2004, and i thought it was very late, like in the early am. so, i lit my smoke, and noticed that one of my shoes was untied. so, i leaned over to tie it, and as i did, a neon green light started forming around me.

terrorified, i looked quickly to the sky, and something like about a quarter mile up, or probably less, since it was hard to gauge as it was very dark, a large silhouette of a large roundish craft was slowly making its way across the, burbank, sky. it was a large ufo. all you could see was a rounded silhouette blackness against the backdrop of a million stars. this craft must have had a cloaking device activated. since i could see pure blackness slowly moving across the sky against the stars, it must've had a cloaking device on. i was instantly impressed with it. i was somewhere between awestruck, and terrified. i watched as this craft made no sound whatsoever. something that large, should be making noise, it wasn't. also, there was neon green flame licks coming out the backside of the craft, too. the flames licks moved like fire from a fireplace, but, the flames licks moved in a timed rhythmical fashion. the green flame licks, also, made absolutely no sound. it was strange, because not only was there no sound, but the fire wasn't lighting up the entire area either. whatever i was witnessing was unlike anything i ever saw on television, and highly, highly advanced in technology.

as i watched this, i looked to the ground, and realized that the green light that was around me was a circular neon green light about 5 feet in diameter, and was now moving away from me, across my backyard. i looked at this green circle, and deduced it must be coming from the ufo, because it was the same color as the green flame lick fire exhaust. however, i'm used to seeing a beam of light coming from the bottom of, ufo's, on tv. there was no beam of light coming from the craft, it was just a 5 foot circle of green light moving slowly on the ground by itself, wierd.

i looked back up to the, ufo, and thought about going in, and waking up my buddy i was living with, but i didn't because i was so awestruck, and was afraid i might miss something.

it occured to me, as well, that i must be the only one witnessing this event, because no one was screaming, and cars weren't honking, so i came to the conclusion that e.T. must be checking me out?? it was very surreal to say the least. i thought an amazing event like this would have cars honking, people screaming, but none of that was happening.

i can't remember how it ended. therefore, i suspect that i could have been abducted/taken aboard craft. anyways, the next day, i talked to my buddy, and asked him if i told him about the ufo event, and he said, yes. i ended up finding out that it wasn't in the am this happened, either. actually, it was in the pm, and we were watching a movie, when i deceided to go out for a quick smoke break. so, as soon as i went outside, my memory issues must have begun, because i have no recollection of even watching the movie. this is why i believe i was abducted/taken aboard craft. most memory issues or tied to this. moving on, my buddy said that he saw some lights through the window, but figured it was just cars. so, while he's watching television, i'm outside having an incredible ufo experience, wow!

my buddy said that, when i came back inside, finally, it looked like i had seen a ghost, and that i was very quiet the rest of the night. my memory, and sense of being alert, didn't return until the next day. that's when i asked him, if i had told him about the ufo event, and he said, yes. so, that's when i started figuring out that something else must have happened, but i can't bring myself to go under hypnosis.

no, i wasn't on drugs, or drunk, and it is what it is. i know this happened, so it doesn't matter if anyone believes me.

i do know this that we are not alone. i took, astronomy, at college. we have a sun in our solar system, and our solar system is large, right? our sun is one of millions of suns, aka stars, in our own galaxy. there are millions, billions, of galaxies out there, so to think that we are the only life out there is ridiculous. it would be a waste of space if we were the only ones. just sayin....
content.summary: Unlike anything i've ever observed on television. the technology was highly, highly advanced over humans.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard in wendell, nc right as the sun was about to set @ around 8:15pm est. trimming up a tree. we had just had a quick nasty thunderstorm. i pulled the branch i just cut out of the tree and swung it around and placed it where my pile was going to be. i then turned around to go get another branch and noticed 4 very odd lights i've never seen before on any type of aircraft man made in the southeast sky headed northeast and they were in a box formation or it was one craft. there were no other objects in the sky at that time. it was moving slower than a jet liner and was maybe 10,000 feet high. it had no sound at all and no vap trail. i watched it trying to figure out what type of aircraft it was. i was stumped. the two lights in the front were green, simultaneously pulsing and the other two lights behind them were red and not pulsing. these were larger than normal aircraft lights and brighter. when the two green ones pulsed out, i couldn't see an object. the two green lights seemed to close in together and that's when it made a 90° turn towards the northwest, i was in shock when that happened and then made a 45° turn towards the west. that's when i knew i could run and get my wife and phone and it would still be there. not even 10 seconds later when we came back out it was gone! we could see the sky in all directions and at the speed it was moving it should have still been there. i was covered in goosebumps and my wife said my look on my face was one she had never seen on me before. i wasn't scared at all just in kind of a shock. my wife said she saw a bright flash out the corner of her eye as we came out. i didn't see it and asked her where and she pointed directly where i saw it last. she said it was a quick streaky flash like a meteor going west. about two or three minutes later a jetliner passed over head headed east northeast and it's lights and height were right and it had its sound. i immediately posted on facebook asking if anybody else had seen this. then i came here to you guys. i always believed this stuff could be real but now especially after those instant out of this world g force turns and instantly gone silent actions, i'm a real believer now! any questions feel free to ask. sorry if i jumbled this, i'm still in shock and my mind can't stop. wow!
content.summary: 2 red non pulsing 2 green pulsing lights. not sure if one or four objects. a couple of straight path instant 90° turns then gone instantly

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out to go to the bathroom and was looking at the stars when i noticed something larger than a normal star with red and blue lights that were not flashing and it was just hovering in the sky.I went inside and got my husband so he could confirm that i was not seeing things. we watched for a while and after about 30 minutes we went back in the house it was still in the sky when we went inside.
content.summary: I went outside to take my dog out and was just looking up at the stars when i noticed something larger than normal in the sky so i went and got my husband to make sure i wasn't seeing things and he confirmed i was not crazy.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure what to do about this and even kinda afraid to say anything or show others the picture i took because i'm afraid people may think i'm crazy but on 5-13-2015 at around 4:50 am in the very early morning when i was going to work , there was a very beautiful sunrise on the superstition mountains and like i always do i took a picture of it and then i noticed three small lights to the left in a v shape and within a few minutes they just faded out , they didn't move at all in the time i was looking at them , so when i was walking up to the building i thought ( i wonder if i caught that on the picture i took ) and when i looked omg it was even better than with my eyes , i don't know what it was but i've tried taking a picture in the exact same way and time and it show's nothing, i don't know what to do and i just keep thinking about it and it's stressing me out, any advice on what i should do ?
content.summary: I saw three v shaped light's in the sky .

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a smoke break, sky was completely clear, bright sunshine. i looked up at the sky, soaking in the sun. i noticed a pill shaped white object moving at very fast speed. that is what made me watch it. i was puzzled, no chemtrail, no sound. i just watched it until it disappeared. we always have aircraft moving across the sky, but this was moving so much faster. things that struck me, no sound, no chemtrail, no wings. and it's speed was just incredible.
content.summary: Looked pill shaped

content.detailedDescription:
In my living room watching tv,i just heard a helicopter so i ran outside looked up and saw this white light object flying near a plane,i just couldn't believe what i was looking at then i took a picture then a video,i just noticed the flying light object but after taken the video i noticed the flashing,and a solid dark greyish object flashed by after going frame by frame,what can i say finally a picture and a video after seeing these objects before,i lost sight after a few minutes.
(picture and video with my iphone)
this second video on president day weekend while the president was i palm springs ca in feb 2015 2:00 pm
shows a military jet flying right above my home it flew from east to west three times,i took three videos one of witch shows a dark object flying around the jet like if dancing,after the jet headed east towards palm springs,after i looked at the video there are three lights they form a triangle at one point.
(also a video of a military helicopter with a strange light object)just a few days after in feb.There has been military activity in this area such as multiple low flyovers.The last photo at night again less than 500ft right above my home what i saw was three military helicopters flying in what looked like a "orion"formation this strange photo.
content.summary: Flashing bright light,and a solid object flying threw video frame.

content.detailedDescription: I want you to contact me by phone. [phone # moved/cms/rjl] this is a recurring event since childhood for me i have multiple events to report and this site is insufficient for me to do so.
content.summary: Blueish white star with light speed.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was sitting at my kitchen table going through a flashback of a past-life remembrance through a reiki iii transformation process. the event came on without my control.

2. first, i saw this eye - like a glassy alive eye of hazel color appear in the air before me. it seemed to be looking around the room but otherwise it didn't move. before i knew it, i was then in a ufo on a gurney and  felt a laser cut into my chest and although it was in a past-life or coming from my mind, i experienced it in the here & now.

3. i knew the aliens were cutting into me for i saw them above me - two of them. they looked exactly like the little green ones with big eyes that one sees in the media, etc.

4. in my mind, i saw myself, an egyptian woman, laying dead in a pyramid and the ufo beaming me on board. flash to the hospital like room with super bright lights. i was laying on a gurney and the two aliens were right in my face above me. there were very bright lights in my eyes.

5. i felt them cut into my chest with a laser. i experienced it as though it were happening in the here and now and screamed.  i was panicked and tried to communicate with them but i was both observing what was happening to me and laying what seemed like myself as being dead, on the gurney so i couldn't tell them to stop. i picked up the telephone and begged my reiki master/teacher to make the whole event stop. i  was on the phone with her crying while it was sill going on.

6. the event abruptly stopped on its own.
content.summary: During a past-life memory remembrance under reiki iii i remember past life in egypt. a ufo beamed me onto its ship from the pyramid my body was in. i was laying on a hospital gurney and humanoid ufo creatures were using a laser and cut into my chest.

content.detailedDescription: It was a stormy night. lightening was flashing in the sky and rain fell intermittently. when i had seen the lights it was not raining. i was traveling from south greensburg towards youngwood on route 119 nearing south grande blvd intersection. the object was coming from the east and did hover near the area of my vicinity. i pulled over by the greensburg sewage plant to complete my observations.The object was a deep red glow which pulsated to an orange red glow and then back to red. from the end pointed towards the east balls of light emitted and disappeared. this emission happened twice. it was after the emission that it seemed to hover. after watching it for about four minutes it moved northward disappearing into the dark clouds. no sounds were detectable but i was near the highway. i had never seen a plane glow that color. no marker lights were flashing.
content.summary: Red then orange-red glow with emission of sparks or balls of light, traveled east to west, then north

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, in lemoore, ca. i had gone outside to get some air. i looked out toward the east side of the valley and started tracking what i thought was a jet from the nearby naval base, naslemoore, going north at a high rate of speed. there was a flashing a blue light only, which was odd. it then changed direction instantly to the south. no arced turn just a 180. i climbed up onto the roof, hoping not to lose it below the horizon. it was nearly out of sight when it changed direction again, heading what appeared to be straight toward my location. i walked up to the highest point of our roof, and the object passed by about 100 yards away, at about  50 feet above an apartment complex. it was then i could see or observe the following: it was about 70 feet long, saucer shaped, dull in color, had a small soft white light dome in the top center. the dark blue light was "orbiting" or circling the dome, which from a distance had made it look as if the object were flashing a blue light. the only sound it made was the object cutting through the air, like a glider would make. it then crossed the railroad tracks over the coors warehouse, turned briefly toward the west while rising about another hundred feet, and shot up like a bullet to what appeared to be the middle star in orion's belt. a neighbor down the street saw it as well. no one believed us.
content.summary: Saw blue white light that changed directions four times.

content.detailedDescription: We were camping at the edge of the ansel adams wilderness checking the sky for satellites. we saw a faint light coming our way from the east. the light then gradually became much brighter and passed over us and disappeared over the mountain to the west. we were discussing what we saw, only about thirty seconds later, when it came back from the west, and headed east again. it grew very bright, then faded to dim, to bright again, then faded so dim we could not see it. it made no noise.
content.summary: Yellow/white orb from east to west, then returned same path

content.detailedDescription: We were camping at the edge of the ansel adams wilderness at about 7500 feet. we were counting how many satellites we could spot in a night. we noticed a satellite coming from the east to the southwest, which is diagonal to all other satellite orbits we've seen. it then stopped, and emitted what looked like a lightning bolt. it then changed it's course down, about 20 degrees. it stopped again, again emitting a lightning bolt, then turned toward the south until we could no longer see it because of the treeline. the object never changed directions as it was moving. we were amazed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a star or satellite but stopped then moved again emitting bolts of

content.detailedDescription:
We were on vacation with penthouse view when i noticed something weird about the lights on top of the radio tower at garden city next to the pier.  king fisher inn is right there. called my fried onto the deck and pointed and spoke about the unusual lights. she was convinced it was just a tower but i arged that wasn't there yesterday...About that time it took off from the tower as if it heard me and came eye level with us across the balcony and over the ocean shoreline where it stayed for a minute as if to give us a good look. i told my friend there is no known aircraft that can do this, this is new technology. no emissions or disturbance of air anywhere around the parked in mid air craft! it looked like the top of a batmobil with stealth craft coloring...Dark grey but slick! like the car, you could see the lines in the craft like foe wings that did not extend out like wings, it was....Built in looking, like the top of batmans car lol! 
this thing showed us like a personal performance just for us then took off over the water to myrtle beach, it reached in a second and then disappeared from my field of vision.  i never heard of you and started watching shows that mentioned you and decided to report.  it may have been an alien craft that i saw but that had to be a smart ass man parked on top of that tower with a hey..Watch this, we can hide in plain sight if it were not for the woman on that balcony pointing! i never moved away to grab any video, i was afraid if i moved aggressively i would miss out on a truly remarkable experience. it knew i wasnt afraid and i would swear it heard me! now that's a show at the beach and i'm going back this year and hunting for them! we must have this technology, i would also swear that was a mortal man pilot although i could not see anything in those 2 dark windows on my side! if they were alien, then they have a sense of humor!  that could be good for us!
[name redacted/cms/tg]
content.summary: Top of penthouse noticed lights showed my friend and we observed the craft come down from radio tower i pointed to, it gave us a show like it heard me. it hovered eyel level to give us a look then took off over water disappeared at myrtle beach

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at base of dome rock mtn.5 miles west of quartzite az. on mining claim aquarious at dusk when at east side of mtn. 3 or 4 b-2 "spirit" stealth bombers came into view. they had large lights below each wingtip that were cycling on and off slowly. they were very low and about one half to 3/4 of a mile from us and plainly visible in fading light as the b-2 bomber. they moved very slowly down the mtn. and we were almost level with them at this point looking toward i-10 they then turned to the left and turned lights off over the highway i-10 east towards phoenix. the next day while in town for supplies heard about the lights over phoenix event. and had a good laugh about it...!
content.summary: Observed stealth  bombers cycling lights on off

content.detailedDescription: My 15 year old son and i went to rachel, nevada on vacation and stayed 8 nights there. having no night sightings what so ever, we then towed our camper to goldfield, nevada in hopes of entering the famous haunted goldfield hotel, haunted school and hang out late at night at the haunted cemetery and to stay a week there. one night we were at the cemetery sitting on the hood of my pickup truck facing due west, a little after midnight there suddenly appeared to the south three huge bright blinding  white lights in perfect alignment at a 45 degree angle that came on separately at about 2 seconds apart. my son and i kept asking each other; "what the [language removed/cms/rjl] is that?!?!? these lights never moved an inch and stayed on for approximately 10 minutes and shut off in sequence as they had come on. during this my son was looking to the west in a pair of 10x50 high powered binoculars when we spotted a triangle of golden lights in the sky for about five minutes that suddenly separated into 3 triangles that were also stationary in the sky over area 51. after the triangles separated into three triangles for about 20 minutes they became one triangle again and formed into a single light for approximately 5 seconds and also shot into the sky like a bullet leaving a rifle barrel. i then noticed what looked like a jet airliner with no blinking lights flying from the north-west flying due south-east over area 51 with its steady blue light that came to an instant stop and changed to a white/golden color that was almost hidden by the stars in the sky but was a slightly different color and never moved for about 25 minutes. all of a sudden this light that was stationary reminded me of a welder with its sparks flying what was being welded in a down ward fashion shot straight up in the sky faster than a bullet leaving a rifle. after all this we seen a light as thou it was an airplane flying in from the north-west, fly directly to the south-east but its flying was extremely erratically, bouncing like from side to side and up and down. all of these strange, strange lights we witnessed lasted about 55 minutes. as suddenly as this light show started, it suddenly ended, no more lights to be seen. we have seen many more lights that moved about in a non traditional flight patterns. i was so glad my son was there to witness these strange lights so i could tell people what i had seen and my son was there so he could say; "yes we seen ufo's and my dad isn't crazy"! my son really never was a believer of ufo's or alien's until he witnessed these ufo's with me, he is now a full believer in ufo's and aliens after seeing them for himself. you may call me to ask me more about this event and would be happy to do so, call anytime.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangles, bright lights, welder sparks type lights in the skies over

content.detailedDescription: I was on my rooftop patio, watching fireworks and keeping my eye on the sky. since my report last year, i constantly look up. the red orbs come back occasionally, sometimes during fireworks. i noticed the first orb, off in the distance to the south west. bright red/orange, about golf ball size, solid non-flashing light. a different light, from the planes flying around and above it. i start filming. dead silent. steadily moving to my position. i notify my girlfriend. as it nears our position, it slows and turns east as though it were on rails. we both feel really happy that they've come back to visit. we feel validated from our sightings before, and kind of joyous. a landing plane passes over it's position (2 engine passenger jet). both are in the shot for comparison. the orb heads east & disappears through the clouds. i stop filming. my girlfriend spots orb #2 headed from the same direction as #1. i begin to film again. same flight path. same characteristics. same slowing and course change towards the east, when it reached my position. we waved to it and tried thinking happy thoughts. we both felt an electric charge. goosebumps and the like. orb #3 came from the same direction. same story as the first 2. during it's turn, the light looked like it does when a laser gets shone in your eye (i assume that's exactly what happened). orb #4, came from ssw. under the path of landing planes. once it reached our position, it veered east roboticly/on rails/perfectly. i noticed the air traffic was reduced to small planes, 2 of which moved rapidly from the south, to north east. i assumed that was a fighter interception. for 15 to 20 minutes after that, only small aircraft flew around the downtown core & along the lake shore. after that, the heavy aircraft began landing again.
content.summary: I filmed 4 red orbs in 3d, passing over me in front of planes.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside house to photograph sunset and noticed a glowing almond shaped object in sky.
content.summary: Was taking picture of sunset noticed almond shaped object glowing

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my daughter at her home on haslam drive in scarborough  i left for the bus 7 minutes before the bus was to arrive at my stop (in canada we can call a "hotline" and it will let us know when the bus will be at a certain stop. buses will not leave early than they are suppose to or late) as i was waiting at the bus stop this huge craft came over the top of me. it was just over the treetops or the houses.I could not make an outline of the craft however i think it was a triangle. there was one red light at the end of this craft. i could not see any stars through this craft. i also noticed there was no traffic, no one on the street heard no sounds. once the craft left a lone dog came up to me from behind, it made the most unusual noise, and i stood there frozen and just said nice dog. then a group of dogs started barking he cocked his head and made the same unusual noise. finally the bus arrived about 30 minutes later and the driver though that the dog was mine, i told him no and he closed the doors. i sat at the front of the bus, i was pretty scared and the driver and i both saw a black dot go by very quickly. he asked me if i had seen the same thing and i said yes i had. 
i had reported this sighting, i had an investigator come to my house to speak to my daughter and myself and yet i cannot find my report in the cms system. 
i am a field investigator for mufon florida.
content.summary: I was waiting at bus stop at 11pm after visiting my daughter when something very large came over my head just above the roof tops and trees having one red light at the end.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were talking to our neighbor behind our house in his backyard when i noticed a triangle shaped object flying toward us from south to north. i watched it fly toward us for about 30 seconds before i ask what it is. it was going less then 50 mph with three lights one on each corner. it was dark out i did not hear any noise as it flu over our house and us. all three of us saw it. it was flying to slow for a plane or jet it was very big hard to see how big with it being dark out. i live about an hour from edwards afb i have seen many planes and helicopter's around here this was something like i've never seen before.
content.summary: Talking with neighbor when i noticed 3 lights in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: At 4:00am my dog woke me up at this unusual time for her to go outside. i went outside and looked up to notice a flying saucer object with moving red and white lights. i rubbed my eyes in disbelief looked up again to see that it was there. i watched as it was aprox. 100feet above tree lines moving about 25mph nw for about 5 minutes before it was out of my view. there was red lights undernieth on the outside then next to it was white lights the lights were moving slow in a pattern. the dog did not bark as she was looking around the ground sniffing. the craft was making a loud but soft humming noise that almost sounded like a loud fan from an aircraft. the sound went loud and hummed fast for a few seconds then went to a soft hum and slow for a few seconds.It did this the whole time. the craft itself seemed to be aprox 100ft circumference. it was a clear night with lots of beautiful stars. i had never seen anything like this before and i was not afraid but just mesmerized. i will never forget the noise or the visual of this craft.
content.summary: Disc shaped flying object with red and white moving lights

content.detailedDescription: Black hovercraft vehicle, floating in air motionless and then moving of later, there  was a kind of grass cutting noise although no grass in the area, and middle of the night, however when it moved off there was no noise.
content.summary: Blackhovwring ovalshap at front, craft.

content.detailedDescription: Outside for my  morning smoke and observed bright moving object moving towards me. strange part is it is cloudy and no start can be observed. check out the video. this is what i saw the last time i was outside and reported with no video.
content.summary: Finally caught it on camera

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1am on a nice clear night outside. i was in my backyard having a smoke resting , i just got home 2 hours ago from work. 

i first noticed the object when i saw a yellow bright orange type orb in the sky. it was very odd to me because i study planes and jets since i am trying to join the canadian forces. 


i really had no idea what it was, i tried to think of different planes night lights, signal lights and realized most flash on planes for other planes to see it easier and have red and green lights usually on commercial planes and are at the wings , front or back i noticed.After some though,  i then really thought it was a alien ufo from what i witnessed 


i noticed that it was just hoovering there like nothing i have seeing ever before. after about 3 minutes from what i timed, it started to very slowly mover north west from it position. it moved quite slower then i have seeing in my life. i live very close to the yvr airport also so i regularly observe the air plane speed , trails they leave ect. after only 30 seconds of moving very slow it just stopped dead in its tracks and hoovered some more, after another 5 minutes it started to speed up, not really fast or the speed of a plane but fast enough to travel a block in at least 5 seconds easy, and i mean a good length distance. i then looked at more of the shape and look. i noticed that it was orb circle like, but as if was flat in the seance, imagine drawing a circle on paper and looking at it from the top,but with a circle threw the middle opposite way. it had that type of ring bass, but had a bright glowing orb to it all around. i noticed that the inner part of the orb seemed to be a more thick , dense, orange with a brighter yellowish orange on the outside of it. i quickly ran inside about 2 meters away from where i was. i live on a single level co op in a small place, it took me no more then 5 seconds to reach my computer to look at the time and date. i then ran rite back out side, a total of 10 seconds the most and it just disappeared , not a single trace was left at all.

i was quite amazed really, i always believed it was ignorant to think god is not from space if religious or that we are the only ones in the universe.During the sighting i was quite like ok, i have to figure this out , what the beep (can put some imagine nation to which swear word i used) is this, this cant be a plane or helicopter, and if it was a helicopter would i not here it?? it left me wondering what was this. i know i am not delusional as  i got my self tested for mentle health and disorders 3 years back just to learn more about my self and do to the fact my mom got psychosis from taking to much medication so it made me do that. i know i was not seeing things so i am left really wanting to figure this out is all i could think.


i lost sight of the object by running in to check the date and time. i was to amazed so i forgot to write or type it out. i have memory that is amazing though and can remember things from childhood, at a age most cant.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A hovering bright yellow orange orb, seeing from my back yard, switching paths and direction very slowly then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight from minneapolis, minn to great falls, mt in october of 2000. it was a sunday night. the sky was clear, no clouds. i was sitting in a window seat of the plane. i like looking out the window, even at night, when i fly. i am not sure which state we were over at the time. the flight was a non eventful flight. no turbulence, no issues. almost boring. most passengers were sleeping or reading. all of a sudden, the pilot made an abrupt upward turn to the left..As if to avoid something. the action brought my attention to the window. after the plane leveled out, i observed a bright red orb/light slowly flying along the side of the plane, going the opposite direction..Going east as we were going west. when it got even with the plane, it matched our speed, as if observing us. i watched this for about 3 to 5 minutes. i looked at the other passengers. no one was phased or even concerned about the pilots abrupt action, nor looked out the window. no one was sitting near me, so no one to ask to look. i also didn't ask anyone because, now i am doubting it is another plane. my first thought was that it was a fighter jet. but, that opinion changed when the object suddenly shot away, to the east still, at an amazing speed. nothing i have ever seen. when we landed, i was going to ask a flight attendant what happened. oddly, no flight attendant was in sight...No one. the cockpit door was closed. there was absolutely no one to ask what happened. i have only told a few people of this event. there was no social media in 2000, like there is today; so there was no way to try to ask anyone else if they had seen this. i am sorry i have no photos. i did not have a camera, and i doubt a camera would have picked up the object. i can only guess at it's size,maybe the size of a car; and the distance, since it was dark, is only a guess also...Maybe 100 yards. i am submitting this in the event that this might be related to anyone else reporting a sighting related to this event. it was a sunday evening in october, i believe one of the last two sundays of the month. i have tried to do some research of any records i may have to pin point the exact sunday and time of this event. i believe we were about half way between minneapolis and great falls. if this is any help, i hope it is. fyi, i really doubt that this was a jet i saw. why would the pilot make an abrupt change in his flight...To the point that every passenger was jostled to a very high degree. everyone looked at each other, but night pout the window. i was on the right side of the plane, meaning the object was on the north side of the plane.
content.summary: Bright red orb, in flight

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Out with dog and heard a low resonating him, i looked up and saw a triangular shaped object with 6 white lights and my dog started going crazy. it was traveling around 500 ft above the ground moving east.
content.summary: Out walking dog at rest area.

content.detailedDescription:
Was traveling east on us 280 after dark but not too long after dark.  saw three lights a head in a valley about 2 miles distant.  one later was identified as a tower light about 7 miles away.  as i drove ahead, i noticed that one light flared away.  lights were white and about 350 feet apart.  the highway curves here so there was relative motion.  as i neared where i thought the lights might be located, i saw a small fire in the median to my left.  i looked up and saw a very unusual rectangle with bright, horizontal white lighted slats that remained motionless about 50 feet above a pine tree that was easy to remember.  object appeared to be the size of a refrigerator.  i think the sides were covered with 15 to 20 slats on at least three sides.  i do not remember the top and bottom.  all the slats were brightly aglow with a white light.  houses and a few buildings are nearby but none was near the object.
  many cars were headed in the opposite direction.  i drove on as i had a passenger.  passenger was too low to see the object.  the next day, i stopped and examined the fire with a bit of hesitation because of the possible dangers of what could have started the fire.  the fire was about as big as two king sized beds.  there were some two foot pieces of logs in the fire area that had come off the numerous log trucks but, otherwise the fire location was normal for burnt grass.
  i am 100% certain that the object was not again at the first location as nothing was located there on numerous other trips day or night.
  someone could have had an object in the sky but, i doubt that to be the case.  i would have to call it unidentified by me.  i was not able to generate much interest in the few people i told of the light and so, i just let the event go for at least three months until i found the web site for reports here.  if the object was a drone, the size was very large.  i do not think the object was tethered either. i saw no means of motion.  i did not see it move up close.  i heard nothing because i was in a closed car on a cold night.
content.summary: Refrigerator sized bright white louvered lighted rectangle first seen 1/2 mile away.  then, saw object motionless east of us 280 < 250 feet away.  fire in road median.

content.detailedDescription: I just moved into this neighborhood. as i was driving home with my roommate we turned down 30th ave ne in lake stevens and looked up at the mountain.  i don't know what mountain it is yet, i think it's pilchuck, and at the top of the mountain was a gigantic bright shining object and we were both stunned. we were talking and it was so surprising it made us both stop and we pulled over amazed. we couldn't believe what we were seeing and asked each other if we had seen a ufo we took pictures of it we took video of it, but it was too fat away for video... anyway it just hovered there, it was extremely bright, so bright we wetter shocked by how big and how bright it was.  it was gigantic it had to be maybe a mile or more wide and it moved slowly backward and down behind the mountain.
content.summary: Looked up to the mountain driving home. saw gigantic hovering ufo. large as the mountain top

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I went to put the stray kitties food up and people were setting off fireworks. i turned the scanner on and kept watching the fireworks and a bright light (which i thought was a police chopper) came in this direction really fast then it slowed down as it got a block away. as it got closer it actually got more dim than it was when it was when it started across town which is weird. it should've gotten brighter right? so that one disappeared and then the scanner started going crazy with stuff going on. there was an accident and an overdose and some other stuff going on. as those things were happening i saw another one not as bright but still bright so i went to get my boyfriend to look at it so i had a witness but right when he walked out the door it disappeared. then when he walked back into the house it got brighter again and then disappeared. when i looked up again it had gotten lower on the horizon. i stopped watching it and went back in the house because i started getting a little freaked out. i immediately sent a message to my mom. she's the only one who believes me when i talk about these things. she's seen ufo's in the past as well when living in monterey, ca.
i tried taking video of the small one. couldn't get a good shot of it unfortunately. 
i've seen these same lights before in the same area as tonight at least 2 to 3 other times over the last year. i never had a reaction before. however, this time my heart started racing a little and i still have goosebumps almost 45 minutes later.
they appear starlike and vary in color from yellow, orange and red.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: #1 started really bright, got dimmer as it got closer. #2 appeared bright then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice sunny winter day,i was at my friends camp i go there often,i was going to the lake to set out some ice fishing lines,while he was shoveling snow off the flat roof side of the camp,it was about a kilometer from the lake,i had to pass my other friends camp where i was going ice fishing,i was about 100-150 meters off shore,where i decided to drill the holes in the ice,with my gas powered ice auger,i drilled 2 holes and was baiting the lines when i heard this low whistling sound it wasn't a steady whistle but on and off,ithought it might have been the wind whistling through the eye on the fishing rod,so i put my ear closeto the eye on the rod but didn't appear to be coning from that,so i looked at my buddys camp on shore to see if there was anything there that would make the whistling noise,just a weather vane and a venmar on the roof,but i been there hundreds of times and never heard that noise before,the whistle stopped and another weird noise started,sounded like something you would hear in an old spooky movie,i started laughing and went on to drill a couple more holes in the ice,this time the noise sounded like the one on crocidile dundee,where he twirles that thing over his head,i started laughing again wondering whwere all this weird noise was coming from,than the whistling started again,so again i put my ear down by the eye on the fishing rod to see if it was coming from it,than there was this high pitched sound,i instantly put my hands over my ears to block the noise but it didn;t seem to do much good just like the noise was coming right through my head,i fell on my knees and sarted to black out,and was falling face first onto the ice,than the noise quit,seemed like it only lasted a few seconds,but that was enough,i got up looked around,checked mt watch for lost time,than headed to my friends camp a kilometer awaywhen i got there he was inside i asked if he had heard anything ,he started laughing,he said he heard the weird noise also but said he didn't hear the high pitched sound;said he must have been inside the camp,i said if the army had anything like that ,they could drop their enemies in their tracks,i tryed to get in touch with a ufoligest,sent him an email,but never got a reply,i wanted to go into the woods around the lake where i thought it might have landed but the snow was to deep
content.summary: Never seen it,just the noises it was making
